means: 萨摩亚的，萨摩亚人（语）的

sentence.Network_en: As you know, Samoan girls are terrific liars when it comes to joking.
sentence.Network_cn: 正如你所知,当开玩笑时, 萨摩亚的姑娘可都是非常棒的说谎者.

sentence.Network_en: Fire dancing is a relatively recent Polynesian tradition, originated by a Samoan dancer in 1946.
sentence.Network_cn: 火刀舞起源于1946年一位萨摩亚舞者,成为波利尼西亚新近的传统.

PerfectNetExp.abs: samo 萨莫, samoan 萨摩亚人的, samoa 西萨摩亚

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of the Samoan Islands
1. of or relating to Samoa or its people or language or culture;

auth_sentence.content: The 6ft 2in winger, who was born on the Samoan island of Upolu, has played for Auckland in the Air NZ Cup since 2007.
